id.comment: undeclared synonym

query.querystr: stmt s; Select a such that Modifies(s,a)

id.comment: undeclared synonym

query.querystr: stmt s; Select a such that Uses(s,a)

id.comment: undeclared synonym

query.querystr: stmt s; Select a such that Follows(s,a)

id.comment: undeclared synonym

query.querystr: stmt s; Select a such that Follows*(s,a)

id.comment: undeclared synonym

query.querystr: stmt s; Select a such that Parent(s,a)

id.comment: undeclared synonym

query.querystr: stmt s; Select a such that Parent*(s,a)

id.comment: repeated synonym

query.querystr: stmt s, s1, s1; Select s such that Follows(s, s1)

id.comment: repeated synonym

query.querystr: stmt s, s1; read s1; Select s such that Parent(s, s1)

id.comment: not assign synonym for pattern clause

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s pattern s(_, _)

id.comment: arg_1 for Modifies is WILDCARD

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Modifies(_, _)

id.comment: arg_1 for Uses is WILDCARD

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Uses(_, _)

id.comment: arg_1 for Follows is not stmt synonym or its subset

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Follows(v, 1)

id.comment: arg_2 for Follows is not stmt synonym or its subset

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Follows(1, v)

id.comment: arg_1 for Follows* is not stmt synonym or its subset

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Follows*(v, 1)

id.comment: arg_2 for Follows* is not stmt synonym or its subset

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Follows*(1, v)

id.comment: arg_1 for Parent is not stmt synonym or its subset

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Follows*(v, 1)

id.comment: arg_2 for Parent is not stmt synonym or its subset

query.querystr: procedure v; Select v such that Follows*(1, v)

id.comment: arg_1 for Parent* is not stmt synonym or its subset

query.querystr: constant v; Select v such that Follows*(v, 1)

id.comment: arg_2 for Parent* is not stmt synonym or its subset

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Follows*(1, v)

id.comment: arg_1 for Uses is not stmt synonym or its subset, or procedure synonym

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Uses(v, _)

id.comment: arg_1 for Modifies is not stmt synonym or its subset, or procedure synonym

query.querystr: constant v; Select v such that Modifies(v, _)

id.comment: arg_2 for Uses is not variable synonym

query.querystr: stmt v; Select v such that Uses(1, v)

id.comment: arg_2 for Modifies is not variable synonym

query.querystr: read v; Select v such that Modifies(1, v)

id.comment: arg_1 for pattern is not variable synonym

query.querystr: print v; assign a; Select v pattern a(v, _)
